Judul: COPPER RECOVERY ENHANCEMENT USING GRINDING CIRCUIT SIMULATION AT C1 AND C2 CONCENTRATOR OF PT FREEPORT INDONESIA
Abstrak:
Mineral particle size is an important parameter in froth flotation. While mineral particle size produced by comminution process varies, and the size range where efficient flotation occurs depends on the copper sulfide mineral, normally froth flotation of copper sulfide  
 

minerals is efficient for intermediate size particle having size range of >10 μm to
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Dr. Ir. Mursyid Hasan Basri
Kata Kunci: simulasi sikuit grinding, fishbone, pareto, tingkat perolehan tembaga, ukuran partikel intermediate
